text: He imana rakhanaryanno! Tumhi tyancyasarakhe ho'u naka, je krtaghna jhale, ani tyancya bandhavambaddala, jevha te jaminivara pravasala kinva jihadakarita nighale, tevha mhanale ki jara te amacyajavala rahile asate tara mele nasate, na marale gele asate1 (tyancya ya vicarace karana he ahe ki) allahane tyancya manata halahala nirmana karavi. Jivana ani mrtyu kevala allahacya avakhyata ahe, ani allaha tumacya sarva karmanna pahata ahe
